mapper.select: SELECT REPLY.RIDX, REPLY.R_CONTENT, REPLY.R_WRITEDATE, REPLY.DELYN, REPLY.TIDX, REPLY.BIDX, TOBE_MEMBER.T_NAME FROM REPLY, TOBE_MEMBER WHERE 1=1 AND BIDX=#{bidx} AND REPLY.DELYN='N' AND REPLY.TIDX = TOBE_MEMBER.TIDX ORDER BY RIDX ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY( RIDX, R_CONTENT, R_WRITEDATE, DELYN, TIDX, BIDX ) VALUES( RIDX_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{r_content}, sysdate, 'N', #{tidx}, #{bidx} )
